tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE device_tracking (
  device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(255),
  device_type VARCHAR(50),
  location_latitude FLOAT,
  location_longitude FLOAT,
  network_provider VARCHAR(100),
  last_update TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE tracking_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    location_id INT,
    last_update TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
    longitude DECIMAL(11, 8),
    region VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE device_usage (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    data_usage DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES tracking_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE device_info (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name TEXT,
    device_type TEXT,
    location_id UUID,
    CONSTRAINT fk_location FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES location_info(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_usage (
    usage_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    data_usage INT,
    network_type TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_device FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES device_info(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE network_activity (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id UUID,
    connection_type TEXT,
    activity_time TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_location FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES location_info(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Device (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    location_id INT,
    manufacture_date DATE,
    last_usage_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Location (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    country VARCHAR(50),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Usage (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    network_id INT,
    usage_date DATE,
    data_transferred FLOAT
);
